10 #include "calculator/furnace/FlowCalculationsEnergyUse.h"
11 #include <cmath>

13 
14 double FlowCalculationsEnergyUse::getArea() {
15  this->area_ = 1300 * (this->orificeDiameter_)*(this->orificeDiameter_);
16  return this->area_;
17 }
18 
19 double FlowCalculationsEnergyUse::getAdjustedDischargeCoefficient() {
20  if ((this->orificeDiameter_) < (this->insidePipeDiameter_)) {
21  this->adjustedDischargeCoefficient_ = (this->dischargeCoefficient_)/(pow((1 - pow((this->orificeDiameter_)/(this->insidePipeDiameter_), 4)), .5));
22  return this->adjustedDischargeCoefficient_;
23  }
24  else
25  return this->dischargeCoefficient_;
26 }
27 
28 double FlowCalculationsEnergyUse::getPressureDrop() {
29  this->pressureDrop_ = pow((this->orificePressureDrop_)/(this->specificGravity_), 0.5);
30  return this->pressureDrop_;
31 }
32 
33 double FlowCalculationsEnergyUse::getAdjustedGasTemperature() {
34  this->adjustedGasTemperature_ = pow(520/(460 + (this->gasTemperature_)), 0.5);
35  return this->adjustedGasTemperature_;
36 }
37 
38 double FlowCalculationsEnergyUse::getAdjustedGasPressure() {
39  this->adjustedGasPressure_ = pow(((this->gasPressure_) + 14.7)/14.7, 0.5);
40  return this->adjustedGasPressure_;
41 }
42 
43 double FlowCalculationsEnergyUse::getFlow() {
44  double area = getArea();
45  double dischargeCoefficient = getAdjustedDischargeCoefficient();
46  double pressureDrop = getPressureDrop();
47  double gasPressure = getAdjustedGasPressure();
48  double gasTemperature = getAdjustedGasTemperature();
49  this->flow_ = area * dischargeCoefficient * pressureDrop * gasTemperature * gasPressure;
50  return this->flow_;
51 }
52 
53 double FlowCalculationsEnergyUse::getHeatInput() {
54  double flow = getFlow();
55  if ((this->gasHeatingValue_) <= 0){
56  this->heatInput_ = 0;
57  }
58  else {
59  this->heatInput_ = (flow * (this->gasHeatingValue_) * (this->operatingTime_)) / 1000000;
60  }
61  return this->heatInput_;
62 }
63 
64 double FlowCalculationsEnergyUse::getTotalFlow() {
65  double flow = getFlow();
66  this->totalflow_ = (flow * this->operatingTime_);
67  return this->totalflow_;
68 }
